title: Marvel Adventures Hulk Vol. 4: Tales to Astonish (Digest)
description:
The Green Goliath continues to smash his way through his own Marvel Adventures title! Caught in the explosion of a gamma bomb, brilliant scientist Bruce Banner was transformed into a hulking beast! With no control over his transformations, Banner lives on the run, helping those less fortunate than he, hoping to one day find a cure to rid himself of the rampaging Hulk. Featuring Psycho Man, the Leader, the Abomination and the Marvel Mummies — and the Hulk smashing everything in sight! Collecting MARVEL ADVENTURES HULK #13-16.
All Ages …$8.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-2981-3
